name: Heaven Piercing Giga Drill
text:
2 Level 10 monsters 
 (Quick Effect) You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card; change all monsters your opponent controls to face-up ATK position (Flip effects are not activated). Your opponent cannot activate monster effects in response to this effect activation. If an Xyz monster this card is attached to is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 Machine Xyz monster from your Extra Deck 1 rank lower than the destroyed monster, then attach this card to it as material.
